name: GPU Status Check
description: Checks current GPU presence and driver status; optionally collects utilization and memory telemetry via Windows performance counters and vendor tools.

parameters.name: N_SampleDurationSec
parameters.help: Total duration (seconds) to sample GPU performance counters.

parameters.name: N_SampleIntervalSec
parameters.help: Sampling interval (seconds) for GPU performance counters.

parameters.name: B_CollectPerfCounters
parameters.help: Collect Windows GPU performance counters when available.

parameters.name: B_RequirePerfCounters
parameters.help: Fail the test if GPU performance counters are missing or unreadable.

parameters.name: B_UseVendorTools
parameters.help: Use vendor tools (e.g., nvidia-smi) when present to collect extra telemetry.

parameters.name: B_SaveRawOutputs
parameters.help: Save raw diagnostic outputs to artifacts/gpu_status.txt for troubleshooting.

parameters.name: N_MaxUtilizationPercent
parameters.help: Optional threshold: fail if max sampled GPU utilization (%) exceeds this value.

parameters.name: N_MaxDedicatedMemUsagePercent
parameters.help: Optional threshold: fail if max dedicated memory usage (%) exceeds this value.
